episode_event_6th_anniversary/4001_1001_: Heh. You’re all pretty good.

Leave it to Lear to pick the best of
the best.

He wanted us to teach you about
Terastallizing, but I don’t think I’ve
anything more to say.
Thanks, you two!

Now we’re fully prepared for the
festival!

Anyway, rich people really know how to
make things flashy, huh?

I can’t believe he’s hosting a festival just
to showcase Sync Terastallizing.
According to Lear...

Sync Terastallizing is the result—the
crystallization—of people and Pokémon’s
hard work!

So I shall formally demonstrate to the
world the relationship between Pasio’s
people and Pokémon!
He was really pumped.
Hmph! He’s just showing off!

By the way, I heard in a Pasio Academy
lecture...

a Pokémon’s Tera Type is normally the
same as its original type, right?

But our Pokémon’s Tera Types are
different. Why’s that?

Maybe your partner Pokémon are
special?

I heard there are also wild Pokémon
whose Tera Type is different from their
original.
Oh, I see!

In any case! We taught you how to
Sync Terastallize, so you better nail
it at the event!
Of course! Leave it to us!
episode_event_6th_anniversary/4002_1001_:
Today’s the day—the next chapter of
Pasio shall be written into history!

Sync stones have given people and
Pokémon a new way to shine!
Allow us to show you firsthand!

Now, at this celebratory occasion,
all you sync pairs will have a chance
to get to know one another better!

Let’s go all out and make the most of
this festival!
episode_event_6th_anniversary/6801_1001_:
We’ll finally get to show off our shining
bond!

Yup! We’ve done everything we needed
to. So let’s make this celebration sparkle!
episode_event_6th_anniversary/4003_1001_: Incredible!

Red’s Charizard has always been able to
Mega Evolve into a Dragon type.

But now that he can Terastallize, he’s
even more dragon-like!

Now, as you all know, when we say
“dragon Pokémon”...
we don’t mean just Dragon types!
Really?

Yeah. For every dragon user, there are
just as many ways to battle!

So by Terastallizing, Pokémon like
Gyarados and Aerodactyl can become
“Dragon” in both name and reality!
Lance just keeps going on and on!
Hahaha! Well, to summarize...

Sync Terastallizing can stir battles up
more than ever! Isn’t that right?

And with Mega Evolution, too...maybe
Red’s destined to connect with Dragon
types!

Charizard also seems happy his Tera
Type is Dragon!

If that’s what you sense, Iris, then it must
be true.

That’s right! Dragons are sacred and
legendary creatures!

And you being the living legend, Red,
I think it really suits you.

At this point, you might as well become
a dragon master. What do you think?

Well...I suppose you never were the kind
of Trainer to be boxed into one type!

I wonder how far Red and Charizard
will go.
Do dragon Pokémon even have a limit?

Let’s all keep soaring so we can keep
up with Red!
episode_event_6th_anniversary/4004_1001_: Hi there, Gloria, Cinderace!
You two are shining bright!
Ehehe! Thank you!
Let me introduce you to my friend.

Hello. I’m Larry. Pleased to make your
acquaintance.
Oh! A business card!

Um, I don’t have one—will this work
instead?
That’s very kind of you. Thank you.

(It’s the same as when I met Kabu.
A League Card from the Galar region.)

I tried to make it fancy. What do
you think?
Yes, it’s quite unique...

Gloria, may I ask you something for my
next class?

It’s about your Cinderace. Why did you
choose Rock as his Tera Type?

Oh, well...I didn’t really choose it.
He was like that from the start.

Larry, is it true you can change Tera
Types freely?

Yes. The restaurant I frequent offers it as
a service.

Apparently, if you give them a certain
item, they’ll make you a special dish that
lets you change a Pokémon’s Tera Type!
I see... I didn’t know such a dish existed.
I hope we can try it someday!

Please do. It’s a nice restaurant with a
special feel to it.
Are you a foodie, Larry?

As much as your average person,
I suppose.

Larry knows a lot about Pasio
restaurants, too!
Interesting! In that case...

Would you happen to know any good
curry places in Paldea?!
I want to try some when I visit one day!

Hmm... Curry... Paldea doesn’t have a
ton of places, but...
episode_event_6th_anniversary/4005_1001_:
Huh? You want to learn about
Gym Leaders?

Yes! That’s why I wanted to talk to
you—because you’re an “Ice-type
Gym Leader”!
We heard about you from Mr. Samson.

So we thought you could teach Irida
some things!
Mr. Samson? Oh, must be that surfer.

Um! So what does one have to do to
become a “Gym Leader”?
...You seem really excited.

I am! Learning about the unknown makes
my heart sparkle!

It must be fate I met a “Gym Leader”
like you, Grusha, who can Terastallize!

By learning about the unknown, I’ve
been able to broaden my world.

Many people from Hisui seem to like
learning about the unfamiliar!

Yeah! It must be how they explore this
vast world!
Being brave is cool and all, but...

Stepping into the unknown can be
dangerous. It’s not always sunshine
and rainbows.
Doesn’t that scare you?
Nope! Not me.

When we step into the unknown,
we encounter new challenges.

And as we overcome them, we’ve no
choice but to adapt.

I believe mighty Palkia built this
vast space...

so that people and Pokémon can explore
and change for the better.

Yeah, if we’re always scared of hardship
and failure, we’ll never explore the
world!
And even if things don’t go so well...

the people and Pokémon we meet along
the way might be able to help us!
You’re all rather optimistic.
Your naivete is...kinda uncool.
But I can feel your passion.

Just so you know, being a Gym Leader is
as harsh as the snowy mountains.
If you regret it later, that’s on you.

I’m up for the challenge! Please, lend me
your knowledge!
episode_event_6th_anniversary/4006_1001_:
The shine of Terastallizing is amazing,
but...

I think the moments I shine brightest are
in a serious battle against my rival!

My battles against Gloria and Victor get
super competitive!

Yeah, I feel like my battles against my
rivals like Calem and the others were
always shining!

I was actually slightly ahead of Serena
at first.

That time I taught her how to catch
Pokémon really takes me back.

I was supposed to be a step ahead of
my rival too, since I became a Trainer
with Wooloo before they did.

Does that mean Calem and Hop were
both more experienced Trainers?

Yeah, Calem was the more experienced
one at first. Then we became rivals!

I remember thinking a really talented
neighbor had moved in next door!

And of course, I was disappointed to
lose so many times during our journey.

It’s the friend who’s always by your side
that makes you not wanna lose!

That joy and frustration when you meet a
worthy competitor... I SO get it!
I’m getting fired up just thinking about it!

Let’s ripen your skills and train hard—as
if to surpass those who came before us!
episode_event_6th_anniversary/4007_1001_:
Lacey is from Nimbasa City. She’s Clay’s
daughter!

Oh my! Then perhaps we’re meant to
connect, Lacey!

We are the Subway Bosses of Nimbasa
City’s famous Battle Subway!
We also established the Pasio Subway!

It’s a battle facility in a cave, and it
uses minecarts!

Although to establish it, we had to
negotiate with Clay regarding the land.

He declined at first but agreed after we
explained what we were trying to do!

I was pleased to hear him praise my
Excadrill!

Today’s the perfect opportunity to
challenge the Subway Bosses!

Lacey! Let’s challenge them to a tag
battle!

Why of course—our answer is
always yes!

We’ll show you our best combination!
Perfect! Let this spectacular battle begin!
OK! Let’s give it our all, Sprigatito!
episode_event_6th_anniversary/4008_1001_:
Hey, Florian! I heard about your
situation!

I’m gonna dig up everything there is to
know about you!
Huh? Uhhh...
You already know so much about us.

And yet, I know nothing about you!
That’s not fair!
Carmine...

Starting over from zero must feel weird
for you, Florian. But...
Do you think you’d wanna...
Of course!

Kieran! Carmine! Will you be friends
with me?
I’d love to, Florian!

Their friendship hasn’t changed even
though they’re from different worlds.
I’m a bit jealous.

Hey, Florian. It’s not like I don’t believe
your story, but...

This won’t feel right until I see your skills
firsthand!
So with that said...

Hey! No fair, Sis! I was gonna
battle first!

The big sis goes first! That means the
little brother has to wait!

I guess nothing’s changed with
those two.

Um... Since the four of us are here,
why don’t we have a team battle?
Yeah, great idea!
*sigh* I guess...

All right, Fuecoco! Let’s show them what
we’re made of!
episode_event_6th_anniversary/4009_1001_:
The festival was fantastic! I loved
chatting and battling with everyone.

Most importantly, that sparkle of you
three Sync Terastallizing... I’ll remember
it forever!

I’m sure we’ll have more chances to see
Sync Terastallizing!

This era and Pasio will both keep on
changing!

Always stirring up trouble the moment I
look away! You’re not getting away with
it today!

It seems Lear and the others haven’t
changed.
Looks like they’re having fun, though!

Let’s keep the good times coming too—
and enjoy this event till the end!

Yeah! Since we’re all here, we should
battle!
Time to show our shine one last time!

This will be our brightest moment—one
that lives in everyone’s hearts forever!
